Automated Deployment to Amazon EC2

Shadowman also provides an automated ec2 deployment scripts for bringing up a quorum of 20 agents. This script assumes that a security group named shadowman_agent has been defined with inbound ports 9123 and 22

Step 1

Create a config.yml in a location of your choice

access_key_id: <your aws access key>
secret_access_key: <your aws secret access key>

Step 2

Start the deployment script.

ruby scripts/ec2/main.rb /your/config.yml

Step3

Wait for 20 minutes or so

Step 4

Once the scripts complete, install the newly minted testadmin1.p12 certificate into your browser, blank password. This can be found in ssl-tools/certs/testadmin1.p12

Step 5

Navigate to your newly created instances monitoring console

https://<the dns of one of the new instances>:9123/shadowman
